H0.text: Leaf is the part of a plant that helps the plant make food from sunlight.

H1.text: Seed is the part of a plant that helps the plant make food from sunlight.

H2.text: Fruit is the part of a plant that helps the plant make food from sunlight.

H3.text: Pollen is the part of a plant that helps the plant make food from sunlight.

A4.text: Leaves are the primary organs responsible for photosynthesis and the storage of chemical energy.
